articles.description: Despite the narrative around Manchester United and Erik ten Hag, the Red Devils have now won four of their past five league games after victory over Luton.
articles.title: 'Ten Hag has space to breathe after win over Luton'

articles.description: Arsenal move level on points with Premier League leaders Manchester City courtesy of a hard-fought victory over struggling Burnley.
articles.title: Arsenal go second with victory over Burnley

articles.description: England's World Cup campaign was shrouded with confusion but they found a blueprint that helped them avoid falling apart like previous sides.
articles.title: 'England find the blueprint at the bitter end'

articles.description: Match of the Day's Jermaine Jenas analyses how Wolves came from behind to beat Tottenham, with a spectacular equaliser from Pablo Sarabia followed by Mario Lemina's winner.
articles.title: 'One of the best goals you'll see' - how Wolves saw off Spurs

articles.description: Katie Boulter wins to pull Great Britain level in their Billie Jean King Cup play-off against Sweden after Jodie Burrage is stunned in the opening singles.
articles.title: Boulter wins to pull GB level in BJK Cup play-off

articles.description: Newcastle United defender Kieran Trippier says he told fans "there's no need to panic" when confronting them at full-time following their defeat at Bournemouth.
articles.title: Trippier confronts 'emotional' Newcastle fans after defeat

articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper misses out on a first ATP Tour title with a three-set defeat by Adrian Mannarino in the Sofia Open final.
articles.title: GB's Draper misses out on first ATP Tour title

articles.description: Watch highlights as England end their World Cup campaign with a commanding consolation victory over Pakistan in Kolkata.
articles.title: England end World Cup with win over Pakistan

articles.description: Gareth Southgate says the perception of the England team has improved across the world, if not at home.
articles.title: Perception of England has improved - Southgate

articles.description: Deontay Wilder's team are "hopeful" a deal can be struck to fight on the same card as Anthony Joshua on 23 December.
articles.title: Joshua and Wilder in talks to fight on same card
